msbt.message: You know, I set my morning alarm to play classical music. It's such a civilized way to start the day.
First I'll alphabetize my purse collection, then I'll Oh, hello! I do hope your day isn't as busy as mine, !
There's something about this time of day. I always seem to get a wee bit sleepy Oh my! What was I saying?
This day seems so short and my to-do list seems so long!
Ah, sunset on It's as if this little island has put on a tiara.
What a peaceful evening this is. If only this lovely day could go on and on, .
during the day is divine, but I love how it feels like an entirely different place at night.
The colors of the sunrise always take my breath away. But the view of them from this islandexquisite!
Island life is so invigorating! Staying inside all day would be a terrible waste.
My dear, isn't this weather divine? I tell you, clear skies like this make me feel like anything is possible!
Are you enjoying the blossoms? I don't think there's a more delightful time to be outdoors, .
Oh dear, just look at those clouds I wonder what the weather has in store for us later?
Darling, this weather is so cold I do believe I sneezed snowflakes!
This fluffy coat of snow makes me feel surprisingly warm inside, .
When it pours like this, I prefer to stay indoors and do yoga. Too much rain wreaks havoc on my hairdo!
I couldn't possibly love the sound of falling rain more. The rhythm makes me want to dance, !
One mustn't be afraid of a bit of wet weather. Just think of the rain as an excuse to accessorize, !
Time moves a bit more leisurely here on the island. If I don't watch the clock, the day ends before I know it!
I got up bright and early today, .After all, you know what they say The early gets their to-do list done!
Cherry blossoms bloom so briefly and depart in a blizzard of petals that takes my breath away.
The sky looks so grumpy today! But I refuse to let that get me down.Frown lines are SO unfashionable, .
It's so cold I can't feel my face! That CAN'T be good for my complexion, !
Doesn't the snow look gorgeous? It's like the whole island has been dressed up in white, .
They say listening to the sound of rain is a good way to relax. That must be why I'm feeling so sleepy.
I do love the rain. The sound the smell It showers me in good memories, .
When I hear the pitter-patter of rain, I know it's time to go shopping for new boots!
How are you fairing, ? I do hope life is everything you hoped it would be.
Isn't this weather gorgeous, ?It makes look as if it could be the background for a fashion shoot!
The cherry blossoms are so pretty. But when the season changes and the petals fall, I feel so melancholy.
These clouds are so ominous! Will there be a storm? Will there be sun? The suspense is killing me!
Swirling snowflakes, it's cold! Days like this make me want to eat something nice and warm.
Ooh, I want to play in the snow like I did when I was a little ! Bah! Who says I have to act my age?!
When it rains this hard, one has no choice but to give in to it. Besides, it's very dramatic. And I love drama!
Oh, I never use an umbrella.<10_4 /> For me, rain is like sunshine. It nourishes my soul.
Ugh! I don't know what to do with my hair today! All this humidity is making it impossible to style.
I hope you have something exciting planned for today. It can be quite invigorating to change your routine!
It's yet another splendid day on !Oh, I know I sound unusually chipper, but who can blame me, .
There are things you want to do and things you have to dobut don't forget to do nothing now and then.
The island breeze is quite lovely today, don't you think? It feels as if it might carry my cares away with it.
I love how you drop by to chat with me, my dear. That's all it takes to make me think it'll be a good day.
I never imagined I'd come to this island and make such a dear friend Life is full of wonderful surprises!
